Key Match Events: Bailey Falter carried a no-hitter into the seventh inning.
Falter pitched 7 1/3 frames of scoreless ball.
Falter struck out a career-high 18 batters.
Jared Triolo homered in the win.
Pre-Game Insights: Bailey Falter had a 'terrible' pregame bullpen session.
The Pirates needed Falter to cover innings after taxing their relievers in a bullpen game the night before.
Post-Match Reflections: Marlins manager Skip Schumaker acknowledged Falter's superior performance.
Pirates manager Derek Shelton praised Falter's execution and performance.
Falter expressed appreciation for being recognized as a Major League starter.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pirates completed the sweep of the Marlins with a 3-1 victory.
Falter did not surrender his first hit until the seventh inning.
